title: 5G coverage
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ofcom
summary: Percentage of geographic areas with 5G signal outdoors from at least 1 operator (signal threshold: 110dBm), UK, as of September 2024.
description:
This dataset shows the percentage of geographic areas with 5G signal outdoors from at least 1 operator (signal threshold: 110dBm), in the UK, as of September 2024.

### Coverage 

UK

#### Geography definition

Local Authority Districts and Unitary Authorities,
Counties,
Combined Authorities,
Regions,
Nations (England, Wales, Scotland, Northern Ireland),
Countries (UK, GB, England and Wales)

### Source

 - United Kingdom: [Ofcom](https://www.ofcom.org.uk/phones-and-broadband/coverage-and-speeds/connected-nations-2024/)


### Source Notes and Caveats 
Some of this data has been aggregated and may show differences to other published figures.

measure.label: Geographic area with 5G coverage by at least one provider

ess-beta-metadata.label: 5G coverage
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Percentage of area with 5G coverage from at least one mobile network provider
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage of geographic areas with 5G signal outdoors from at least 1 operator (signal threshold: 110dBm), in the UK, as of September 2024.
ess-beta-metadata.caveats: Some of this data has been aggregated and may show differences to other published figures.
